Игра гoвнo, крутите 360, я пошел катать

After owning this game for 1310 days i reached 1000 hours in this game, i think its time for a review on this hell of toxicity. 

First of all i want to say that i have 1000 hours in this game because i play killer on low rank and play survivor with friends. Killer on high rank is far from fun because survivor are toxic. They will spam click their flashlight at you and piss the shit out of you. They mostly are survivor mains meaning they don't/barely play killer cuz if they did they'd know how annoying they are.
Solo queue survivor is not fun because the random teammates you get are horrible aswell. Certainly the crossplayers are terrible, some are decent but most you get will just make dumb decisions. They will unhook you in front of the killer unsavely, heal themself in a corner of the map, crouch all the time and not do generators. 

The game is heavily balanced to survivors with some loops barely breakable unless you manage to mindgame the survivors or you play Trapper or Hag. Once you broke on loop the survivor moves on to the other one etc etc. 

The devs are incompetent aswell, they bring out a new chapter in the Player Test Build and there are noticable bugs but instead of fixing those bugs they release the game with the bugs in it and patch them out a few weeks later instead of fixing they while the chapter isnt released yet. Also they play their own game and get frustrated by the kind of survivors i mentioned before and then tell us when we get frustrated we should go play something else.

The price of this game is too high for what you will experience, the DLC's are fine but could be a little lower. Then you have the price of certain cosmetics being more expensive then the chapter itself. A chapter costs €6,99, some cosmetics are not buyable with free in-game currency and so have to be bought by purchasing a certain type of in-game currency with the cosmetic costing 1080 auric cells = €10,80 being more expensive then the character itself. With the licensed characters it makes sense but with their own characters it does not since they didnt have to pay for the character to use it in the game.

overal conclusion:
Is it fun?
Survivor, yes but only with friends
Killer, only on lower ranks like rank 9-12

Is it worth buying.
If a friend owns it, yes but only in sale.
If a friend doesnt own it, spare yourself the pain and spend those €20,00 on something worth your time.
除了有时候掉线以外，还是个不错的游戏。

If you love relatively simple horror based games, then this is a great game to play. The objective is straightforward, the gaming mechanics are easy to learn and there is a big player base that's active.

However, I do have to say that some things need fixing. If you are easily annoyed with the gaming mechanics not always working well, then beware. Hitboxes are sometimes way out of line and it happens from time to time that you cannot use a certain action. If you hate to worry about that, stear clear from the game.
If you don't mind a fair bit of dying within the game and you just want a fun time, then I definitely recommend it. It's especially fun with friends. The game is constantly growing and survivors and killers alike are being added regularly.

Is it a perfect game? Absolutely not. I think a lot of people agree that there are things that need to be fixed. Is it a fun game, though? Absolutely. Sometimes it's outright hilarious. If you're lucky then you will come across some really funny killers that will meme with you.
bastante bueno, buena bariedad me encanta este juego y es unico en su categoria

Ever play hide-and-seek as a child? Ever want to relive that feeling of simultaneously laughing while screaming and for some reason always having to pee? Well, do we have a game for you. Laugh your butt cheeks off while your friend playing a 8 ft tall bunny woman hangs you on a meat-hook like you're a wet coat. Five chainsaws outta Five

It feels way to slow to  play as a survivor and it has no real flow to it.
The entire community is made out of toxic people with only a few people that you can actually play with.
And the Queue Times are HORRIBLE i dont know if its because the server or because people realise how badly designed this game is and only a few amount of people play it.
The survivor have to play in a group to do anything to be honest unless the killer is REALLY bad 
The killer have such a hard time going against a 4 stack of survivor if they play it good but only when they play the best killer in the game 
Some are way to bad, while all survivors have the same nothing that is special
The game is full with pay to win or because you can get perks from some charakter that are basically needed by either paying real money or being lucky and spending in game currency that takes long to obtain
(for explanation) each week there are 2 survivor and 2 killer perks that are randomly chosen in the shrine that means you can get the perk that you want on the first day or after like a year)
这个游戏本来我是不知道的，太小众了，但是后来网易出了个第五人格的手游，听说是抄袭杀鸡的，就想着看看原版啥样，结果就被圈粉了。我也算是第五人格的元老级玩家了，我觉得这个玩法很新颖，u1s1是第五人格把我拉进这种非公平竞技的坑，但是在恐怖气氛和玩法多样性上还是杀鸡做得比较好，第五人格砍掉的东西太多了。

Yarrak gibi oyun.bir kızsın tecavüzcü coşgun seni ormana  kaçırmış elinde tabanca  al kurtur elinden diyor oyun.
เกม300บัค50ล้าน

>Artılar<
-Eski ve kült serilerden karakterleri getirdiler/getiriyorlar ki bu korku hayranları için oyunun en çekici kısmı. Sırf Ghostface geldiği için oyunu almış ve oynamıştım.
-Sürekli yenilik içerisindeler, gerek hotfixler, gerek updateler, gerek chapterlar.
-Oyunun eksi verilecek kısımları insanı çok tilt eden şeyler olmasına rağmen oyun kendini oynatmayı beceriyor, hele de 4 arkadaş girince daha zevkli ve daha içine çeken bir oyun oluyor.

>Eksiler<
-Bug
-Bug
-Bug
-Sadece kamplayan ve oyunu oynamamayı tercih eden katiller
-Katile dümdüz koştuğu ve yakalandığı için oyunun ilk 10 saniyesinde quit atan çok karakterli arkadaşlar
-Bug
-Gelen bug düzeltmesinden sonra ortaya çıkan yeni buglar.
-Muhtemelen en toxic oyuncu kitlesine sahip oyun.

В последнее время в игре появилось куча играющих за манов читеров,у которых вкачан перк "Ясновиденье" они просто видят всё время кто и где на карте находится из выживших всю катку.В конце матча смотришь у мана нет не борбекюшки ни одного из перков не стоит который бы мог показать,выдать место нахождения выживших.А ман видит весь матч всех выживших.И так 5 каток подряд(репорты на них сыплю)Читы новые подвезли???????господа разработчики обновите свой античит.Это не дело,играть в игру про пряталки с сыновьями шл*х на читах видящих тебя весь матч где ты находишься на карте.У них не видимый перк стоит называется "ясновиденье" новый перк (мод)в игре судя по всему.
Un bon jeu de COOP pour passer un bon moment de panique et de stress :-)

Bom vamos começar falando de um jogo completamente mal balanceado 
[b] (Se acostume porque a empresa esta preocupada com skins e dlc's) [/b]

[b]No edge (Ninguém escapa da morte) [/b]
Bom poderia ser uma vantagem balanceada porém ela só é mostrada na partida após o Killer 
eliminar um dos aliados no final da partida (Um hit comum derruba qualquer sobrevivente) 

[b]Killers e suas características [/b]
(O Espectro) Após tocar um sino que soa um som para notificar sua presença no jogo e ficar invisível, 
bem o jogo é tão equilibrado que há um equip que faz o sininho ficar sem som ou seja, não notifica sua presença
após sair da invisibilidade 

(Huntress) Ela é um dos killers mais equilibrados pois necessita de habilidade para acertar os machados no ar
porém tem alguns equips que faz o machado derrubar com um HIT para equilibrar isso ela vai possuir apenas 2 machadinhas,
más se equipar outro item pode transformar em 3 machados podendo derrubar boa parte da equipe no jogo

(A Porca) Esse killer é mais peculiar após a primeira derrubada ela pode por uma armadilha na sua cabeça com contagem regressiva, ela também pode usar vantagens para aumentar a quantidade de ''caixas'' para remover a armadilha porem com maior chance de falhar ou seja além ter que correr com uma contagem regressiva na vida um killer no mapa procurando o barulho da armadilha apitando tu ainda precisa se curar achar a ''caixa'' que remove a armadilha.. ou seja você morreu A! 
além de tudo isso ela é um killer sem raio de terror por ser stealph! 

[b] Escolha você jogar, mas a empresa não liga para o jogo! se divirta :) [/b]

Edit: de quem foi o mama rol@ que colocou um killer (Fred grude) que simplesmente consegue substituir as Tabuas por uma que faz a gente perder tempo e tomar hit, killer fica invisivel sem raio de terror e teleporta pelo mapa nmrl? o cara tem todas as skills do jogo.

This game is insanely good! At first, from levels 1 to 7, you will die constantly and will get bored. But the second you're out of that mind set and your skills improve, it becomes the most fun game I have seen! The only issue i've really had, were some network issues, not the game's fault, and bad matchmaking. If I find a game with survivor it's great timing, really quick! But I go against the most insane plays this game has ever seen, it's sooooo unfair for me MOST of the time. Where as with the killer, there's looooooong matchmaking, but sort of easy survivors to go against from time to time.

I give 4/5 stars!

Игра хорошая, со временем становится однообразной.
Пару слов об коммьюнити, оно отвратительное. Играть только за маньяка или в пати.
В игре присутствуют проблемы с пингом, учтите это при покупке, при игре за маньяка у некоторых могут возникнуть проблемы.
